Package com.coswald.jtalker.gui

Interface Colorizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CanvasPanel, ColorChooserPanel
    public interface Colorizer

    Changes a color to another given color. This allows an implementation independent way for a class to allow a color to be changed. This method can be used to send a method as a parameter, like in this class.

    Since:
    JTalker 0.1.5
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    C. William Oswald
    See Also:
    setColor(Color), Color

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void setColor​(Color c)
      Changes the color to the given color.

    • Method Detail

      • setColor

        Changes the color to the given color.
        Parameters:
